column2: Conceptualize, create and develop programs: Events, Workshops, Therapies, performances, sessions, classes of spiritual and artistic nature.      Researching and writing the content for the program.      Keeping a tab on other similar programs happening and their cost etc.      Reviewing the proposals received by teachers and facilitators who want to conduct a program here.      Finding suitable teachers and facilitators who can lead a program.      Co-ordinating with marketing and enrolment to check how the program is fairing.      Co-ordinating and editing the content given by facilitators.      Making a post-program analysis.        People who are spiritually or culturally inclined with writing /editing skills in English are the most suitable. Prior experience in creating and managing events is useful.
column11: Event management, Conceptualization, Development Associate, Research, Cost

column11: Data Collection, Training Coordination, People Handling, Excel Powerpoint

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Program Associate specializing in Environment and Energy (E&E) to join our dynamic team      As a Program Associate, you will play a key role in supporting the planning, implementation, and evaluation of projects within the E&E sector      The ideal candidate will have a passion for sustainability, excellent organizational skills, and the ability to collaborate with diverse stakeholders        Key Responsibilities:        Project Support:Assist in the development and execution of E&E projects, ensuring alignment with organizational goals      Coordinate project logistics, timelines, and deliverables      Research and Analysis:Conduct research on environmental and energy issues, regulations, and best practices      Analyze data and present findings to support evidence-based decision-making      Stakeholder Engagement:Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, including government agencies, NGOs, and community groups      Organize and facilitate meetings, workshops, and events related to E&E initiatives      Reporting and Documentation:Prepare regular reports on project progress, outcomes, and impact      Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation      Communication:Contribute to the development of communication materials, including newsletters, website content, and social media updates      Communicate project objectives and results to diverse audiences      Budget Management:Assist in budget tracking and financial reporting for E&E projects      Ensure compliance with funding requirements
column11: matlab, community development, documentation, program management, presentation skills, training, problem solving, corporate social responsibility, social work, coordination, curriculum development, ngo management, communication skills, capacity building
